original_text: Yet Saul grew more and more powerful and baffled the Jews living in Damascus by proving that Jesus is the Messiah.
korean_text: 사울은 힘을 더 얻어 예수를 그리스도라 증언하여 다메섹에 사는 유대인들을 당혹하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: Yet Saul grew more and more powerful
and baffled the Jews living in Damascus
by proving that Jesus is the Messiah
